body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joe Griffin and the customer's name is Michelle Scott.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership! My name is Joe Griffin, and I am here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Joe, I'm Michelle Scott. I'm looking for some help with my motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Michelle! What seems to be the problem with your motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated because it's been making a weird noise lately.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be concerning. Could I please have the model year of your motorcycle to help us identify the issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's a year two thousand nineteen model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Michelle. Can you also provide me with your phone number, just in case we need to reach you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's two one two, six zero zero, eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for sharing that with me. Our service team will look into the noise issue and will get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Michelle! Thank you for your time today. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
